Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/Prelude/DateTime/daysInInterval
Synopsis Return the number of days in an interval, including the begin and end days.
Function int daysInInterval(interval i)
Usage import DateTime;
Examples 
rascal>import DateTime;
ok
rascal>B = now();
datetime: $2012-09-04T14:05:00.955+0200
rascal>E = incrementDays(B, 2);
datetime: $2012-09-06T14:05:00.955+0200
rascal>I = createInterval(B, E);
interval: Interval($2012-09-04T14:05:00.955+0200,$2012-09-06T14:05:00.955+0200)
rascal>daysInInterval(I);
|std:///DateTime.rsc|(9990,8,<454,8>,<454,16>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: daysDiff
